channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Pope enjoyed broad support among U.S. Catholics
Iraq says Pope Francis' calls for coexistence 'will leave an indelible impact'
item.description: In Iraq, Pope Francis was recalled as a courageous leader who worked to deepen inter-faith understanding.

item.title: Argentina's president, a former critic of Pope Francis, offers his condolences
item.description: Javier Milei, a far-right libertarian who stridently defends free markets, acknowledged his and the pope's differing viewpoints.

item.title: Who is Cardinal Kevin Farrell, the acting head of the Vatican?
item.description: Kevin Farrell is the camerlengo, or acting head of the Vatican, until a new pope is elected. Here's what to know about Farrell, who was born in Irelan...

item.title: A brief history of Trump's feud with Pope Francis
item.description: Trump praised the pope at the start of Francis's papacy, in 2013. But relations soured during the 2016 election, when Francis criticized Trump's propo...

item.title: Drones pose increasing risk to airliners near major US airports
item.description: An Associated Press analysis of an aviation safety database reveals that drones last year accounted for nearly two-thirds of reported near midair coll...

item.title: Pope Francis mourned worldwide as Catholic Church prepares for next chapter
item.description: Pope Francis died Monday at the age of 88. As tributes pour in from around the world, the Vatican faces a transition.

item.title: Hegseth shared Yemen attack details in second Signal chat, reports say
item.description: The private messaging group included the US defence secretary's wife, brother and personal lawyer, sources tell US media.

item.title: What happens next after Pope Francis' death?
item.description: The death of Pope Francis initiates a centuries-old process of rituals and traditions culminating with a conclave to choose his successor.

item.title: Pope Francis's last public appearance on Easter Sunday
item.description: The pontiff's last public appearance was for an Easter Sunday blessing at the Vatican's St Peter's Square.

item.title: Attempts to reach ceasefire in Ukraine littered with years of failure
item.description: The 30-hour "Easter truce" and the reported violations underscore the difficulty in securing even a brief pause in fighting.

item.title: Sri Lanka Easter bombings victims named 'heroes of faith' by Vatican
item.description: The 167 people recognised were Catholics attending mass at churches attacked by suicide bombers.

item.title: President Zelenskyy | Tonight on 60 Minutes
item.description: Inside a bomb shelter for schoolchildren, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy met Scott Pelley. The school is mourning after a Russian missile kil...

item.title: What will happen at the funeral of Pope Francis?
item.description: Pope Francis had expressed the desire to be buried in the Basilica of Santa Maria Maggiore, a fifth-century church in Rome.

item.title: Vatican announces death of Pope Francis aged 88
item.description: The Pope's death comes just a day after he appeared in St Peter's Square on Sunday to wish "Happy Easter" to worshippers.

item.title: 60,000 Americans to lose their rental assistance and risk eviction unless Congress acts
Canonization of first millennial saint postponed after pope's death
item.description: Carlos Acutis is set to become the first millennial saint. His canonization was moved to next Sunday in St. Peter's Square after the death of Pope Fra...

item.title: Secondhand stores are poised to benefit if US tariffs drive up new clothing costs
